title: Erosion Infiltration Technique’: A Novel Alternative for Masking Enamel White Spot Lesion
patient: A 21-year-old female patient reported with the chief complaint of white spot in her upper front teeth. An isolated white spot lesion was diagnosed in 21. Informed consent was obtained from the patient and treatment plan was established as Caries infiltration with ICON (DMG, Germany) [Figure -].
